name: Particle Robots
description:
Particle robot is a 2D last one standing style game made in Unity Engine. I adopted the novel particle robot system proposed by MIT paper "Particle

robotics based on statistical mechanics of loosely coupled components". In this game, I developed a stochastic movement algorithm based on the particle robot system.  I also designed a series of interaction enable the player to built and customize their robots. 

Control

Left mouse button - set destination

Right mouse button & Q button - place a particle at the mouse position

R button - restart the game

Space - stop movement
